definition: to be known as/to be nicknamed/to be purportedly/to claim (often exaggeratedly or falsely)
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: Did you hear about the violist who bragged that he could play 32nd notes?
sentences.chinese: 你听说有个中提琴手号称能拉32分音符吗？

sentences.english: So-called world a stone, is the best orogenic material.
sentences.chinese: 号称天下第一石，是造山的绝佳材料。

sentences.english: "Red" pious, boasts many followers of the "nine" music.
sentences.chinese: “说书红”弟子很多，号称有“高门九英”之说。

sentences.english: Or should I say The Great Persky?
sentences.chinese: 或者我该号称是高人庞？

sentences.english: Known as the "National fragrant incense the king."
All reactionaries are paper tigers. In appearance, the reactionaries are terrifying, but in reality they are not sopowerful.
sentences.chinese: 一切所有号称强大的反动派统统不过是纸老虎。

sentences.english: The area called the grand banks was the most abundant fishing ground in the world.
sentences.chinese: 号称大浅滩的海域是当时世界上产鱼最多的渔场。

sentences.english: A type of contact lens that can correct vision was recently launched in Spain.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙日前推出了一款号称可矫正视力的隐形眼镜。

sentences.english: All the members of each tribe of the same blood, or feigning themselves to be so.
sentences.chinese: 每个部落中的一切成员均同血统，或号称如此。

sentences.english: Yuyao city, Zhejiang province is honored with the title of "Town of Moulds" and "King or Plastics"etc.
sentences.chinese: 浙江省余姚市号称“模具之乡，塑料王国”等美称。

sentences.english: All five-second grenade fuses will burn down in three second.
sentences.chinese: 所有号称可燃烧5秒的手榴弹引线都会在3秒内烧完。

sentences.english: Rong Zuer is all along fast talk sharp words, so - called recreation encircles medium female hero.
sentences.chinese: 容祖儿一向快言快语，号称娱乐圈中的女豪杰。

sentences.english: In the beginning of the Qing Dynasty, Wei-li, who is one of the "Ning Du San Wei", has rich poetic thought.
sentences.chinese: 号称“宁都三魏”之一的魏礼有丰富的诗学思想。

sentences.english: It bills itself as the "best shopping street in China, "but in reality it's far from that.
sentences.chinese: 号称是“中国最好的购物街”，但事实远非如此。

sentences.english: Why the internet industry---the so called "core of new economy"---suffered such a punishing defeat in China?
sentences.chinese: 为什么号称新经济核心的网络产业在中国如此惨败？

sentences.english: Today, I watched Paranormal Activity which is known to be the scariest film ever.
sentences.chinese: 今天我去看了号称史上最恐怖的电影《鬼影实录》。

definition: not just in name only, but also in reality (idiom)
can be rated as/can be said to be
person (first person, second person etc in grammar)/called/known as
called/to call sth (by a name)/to name
the earliest ancestor/originator (of a tradition, school of thought etc)
to count as number one (idiom); second to none/outstanding
